name: 2048:Words
description:
Join the letters!
The 2048:Words app is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game.
Join the letters to create new ones and win the game filling "empty" letters in words!

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same letter touch, they merge into new one. Collect letters to fill words.
